nodes.text: Shuimi were a species of feathered creatures that lived in the scrub forests of the planet Artiod Minor. Juvenile members of the sentient Artiodac species, which were also native to the world, would forage in the forests to collect shuimi feathers for use in making crowns that they would then use to attract a mate.
Shuimi were first mentioned in Star Wars: Aliens of the Galaxy, a reference book written by Jason Fry and released on August 23, 2016.
